message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to purchase [product description] at a price of $1,600,000. This is a substantial investment, but I believe it will yield significant returns for you.  I'm confident this product is worth more than $1,500,000 to you, as it aligns perfectly with your [mention Bob's business goals/needs]. Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
